mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO at_sale_rec ( FID, FBillNo, FSalesNo, FOrgID, FOrgNumber, FOrgName, FDate, FSaleType, FSaleTypeName, FSrcEntryID, FSetType, FSetTypeName, FMemberID, FPayMoney, FRemark, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate, mark ) VALUES ( #{fid}, #{fBillNo}, #{fSalesNo}, #{fOrgId}, #{fOrgNumber}, #{fOrgName}, #{fDate}, #{fSaleType}, #{fSaleTypeName}, #{fSrcEntryId}, #{fSetType}, #{fSetTypeName}, #{fMemberId}, #{fPayMoney}, #{fRemark}, #{fCreateBy}, #{fCreateDate}, #{fUpdateBy}, #{fUpdateDate}, #{mark} )

INSERT IGNORE INTO at_sale_rec ( FID, FBillNo, FSalesNo, FOrgID, FOrgNumber, FOrgName, FDate, FSaleType, FSaleTypeName, FSrcEntryID, FSetType, FSetTypeName, FMemberID, FPayMoney, FRemark, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate, mark ) VALUES
( #{item.fid}, #{item.fBillNo}, #{item.fSalesNo}, #{item.fOrgId}, #{item.fOrgNumber}, #{item.fOrgName}, #{item.fDate}, #{item.fSaleType}, #{item.fSaleTypeName}, #{item.fSrcEntryId}, #{item.fSetType}, #{item.fSetTypeName}, #{item.fMemberId}, #{item.fPayMoney}, #{item.fRemark}, #{item.fCreateBy}, #{item.fCreateDate}, #{item.fUpdateBy}, #{item.fUpdateDate}, #{item.mark} )
